title: The Captivating, Young Adult Fantasy Novel Girl of Myth and Legend Is Now Available via Crowdfunding
text:
Author Giselle Simlett announces that her new, one of a kind, young adult fantasy novel titled “Girl of Myth and Legend” is now available to pre-order at great discount and with lucrative perks via the popular crowdfunding platform, KickStarter. kickstarter.com/projects/470315577/the-chosen-saga-girl-of-myth-and-legend
Fishguard, Wales (PRWEB UK) 20 October 2015
WWS Publishing Ltd is pleased to announce that the amazing book titled “Girl of Myth and Legend”, a pioneer, young adult fantasy novel, by author Giselle Simlett, is now available to pre-order at great discount via KickStarter.
“Girl of Myth and Legend” will be officially released on December 29th, as the first book of the Chosen Saga. In the meantime, let’s get introduced to Leonie Woodville, the heroine of the book, a girl with a past she tries to forget, and a future she can't even imagine. Leonie wants to live an unremarkable life. So when she explodes in a blaze of light one morning on the way to her college, it’s enough to put a real crimp in her day.
And things only get weirderLeonie learns from her father that she is last of the Pulsar, a phenomenally powerful member of a magical species called the Chosen. It will be her sole duty to protect the Imperium, a governing hierarchy, from all enemies, and to exceed the reputation of the Pulsar before her.
Author Giselle Simlett emphasizes “Do you remember as a child opening up a book and being immersed into a world of enchantment and fairy-tales? Do you remember how each word was flowing with magic that utterly spellbound you? This is the foundation of ‘Girl of Myth and Legend’. I wanted to revisit that feeling of wonder, that traditional fairy tale world.”
Now, this first book of the Chosen Saga is available to pre-order at great discount via KickStarter. Funders can choose from a wide variety of lucrative perks including, but not limited to, original music soundtrack, audiobook, signed softcover and hardcover books, handwritten thank you cards, pendants, and special edition of the book exclusive to KickStarter backers.
You can also support this gentle effort by sharing the link with your Social Media networks. To pre-order this fantastic book and claim your perk visit https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/470315577/the-chosen-saga-girl-of-myth-and-legend today.
Dare to dream. Dare to hope. Dare to be a legend.
About
Giselle Simlett, author of “Girl of Myth and Legend”, was born in England in 1991. She has studied Creative Writing at both Gloucestershire University and the Open University. She has a diploma in Creative Writing, Language and Literature and will soon complete her BA Hons Open Degree. She currently lives in Australia with her husband and son. http://www.gisellesimlett.com
